author: chirino
msg: Allowed MBeanMetatdata to be passed to the DeploymentException.  A deployment exception can now say what MBean was being deployed when the exception happened.

author: chirino
msg: Changed the abstract TransportFactory so that it can load TransportFactory implementations dynamicly if the implementations follow a package naming convention.  A few more helper methods were added to BytesMsg.

author: jboynes
msg: Change to use extension mechanism defined in geronimo-j2ee.xsd
